root: ^Naomi, dear, I know how deep it hurts to have never known him. I can sense it emanating from your heart, like a dark mist. But believe me, he had very good reasons to keep you away.
^People keep saying that, but I just can't imagine why!
^All will become clear, when the fates decide. For now, I'll reveal to you a clue--he's right over there!
